ygData.subject: Rubicite and SilverWing
ygData.msgSnippet: been reading up on the spoiler sites this morning, has anyone tested the new lute from silverwing? or know the bard that got it (in FoH)? Secondly, has anyone
ygData.messageBody:
been reading up on the spoiler sites this morning, has anyone tested the new
lute from silverwing? or know the bard that got it (in FoH)?

Secondly, has anyone on the list confirmed that Rubicite is supposedly
dropping in Najena. I'd kill to get my hands on a rubi bp

Minkin
Sol Ro







-----Original Message-----
From: Rosha Unca [mailto:captrosha@...]
Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 9:24 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Said by a group member last night


"Good god, how many songs are you twining!". My reply (after the
battle) "Too many to type!".

Hehe I must say, really brightened my evening to read that. We were
helping with a corpse recovery somewhere in Sebilis (this was my
first time in that dungeon too). Had 2 groups working together. We
had been in several big battles already with multiple pulls each and
during this one we still had several more to go. I think at the time
I had my Lute equipped. The hotkey bank I had up had Verses, Nivs,
Hymn, Jig, and Clarity. I guess she saw several of those flashing
icons on her screen and maybe I actually had a 4 song twist for a
second (Verses, Nivs, Hymn, Jig). It's just nice to be recognized at
times. :)

Rosha Cristi, Bard of 51 {insert something musical here}
Guild Leader, Legends
Innoruuk




Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
